title: nx-locale-switcher
author: HamletDuFromage
description: Changes the locale for specific titles on your Nintendo Switch
details: A Nintendo Switch homebrew app that allows you to change the language and region of your games on a per-title basis, directly from your console. This makes use of Atmosph√®re's per-game settings overriding. As such, this WILL NOT work on any other CFW.
